name: Moon Bounce!
description:
Interstellar travel has never been so fun!

Draw platforms to launch your astronaut into the cosmos. Safely navigate the depths of space by drawing long platforms, or make daring leaps by drawing short platforms. Avoid the astroids as you explore distant planets, nebulas, and galaxies.

Compare your score to friends or the global community.

Safe travels!!!

Check out Moon Bounce! on iTunes!

To remove ads, download Moon Bounce FULL!
